title: Chapter 2020 - 2020 It'S Very Noisy, Please Be Quiet!(2)
body:
Chapter 2020 - 2020 It'S Very Noisy, Please Be Quiet!(2)

2020 It’s Very Noisy, Please Be Quiet!(2)

However, if the Divine Oracle combined with the Divine Secret, it would be the strongest!

Even if Situ Yongren’s Divine Secret was limited and he couldn’t display the combat strength of a Demi-Saint.

However, the Divine Oracle kept his weaknesses hidden and magnified his strength infinitely!

“Slash!”

Without the use of any spiritual technique, Situ Yongren controlled the Divine Oracle, the Imperial Decree and the Way of the Heavens Saint Statue.

The Divine Blade of Judgment cut through the rubble and split open a small mountain.

After the Way of the Heavens Statue slashed down, it split the entire Ghost City of the Netherworld into two!

“Boom!”

The left and right sides of the two pieces of land that were thrown into chaos exploded.

After Rao Yaoyao and Yan Wuse lost control and flew toward the edge, they were trapped in the space by the power of the Holy Emperor.

Originally, the two of them were in despair as they awaited their death.

They didn’t expect that Yu Lingdi would come out to cushion the impact, and then Situ Yongren would descend like a God.

With one move, the Ghost City of the Netherworld separated completely!

“These brats…”

Yan Wuse couldn’t describe the complicated feelings in his heart.

He was already old, but he had been saved by these two young men after he made a careless mistake.

And the ages of these two people added together, were not even a fraction of his age.

“All of you have finally grown…” Yan Wuse felt a lump in his throat.

He restrained his emotions quickly and shouted, “Brat, break the power on my body first. Use the Divine Secret. You can do it!”

Rao Yaoyao’s eyes were also bright as she said, “Believe in yourself!”

Both of them knew that compared to Yu Lingdi, Situ Yongren lost in terms of intelligence.

His courage needed to be trained, and he needed time to nurture his growth.

However, the trip to the Abyss Island and Yu Lingdi’s reckless act seemed to have sped up this process.

Situ Yongren stood up!

“Elder Yan, Sword Saint Rao…”

“I can! I really can!”

Situ Yongren was overwhelmed by his emotions. He controlled the Divine Oracle and steered toward Yan Wuse and Rao Yaoyao.

“Way of the Heavens, Imperial Decree, rules dismiss…”

Whoosh!

Suddenly, the sound of the wind brushed by his ears.

The world suddenly became silent.

Everything slowed down.

Situ Yongren’s heart skipped a beat. He saw the fear in Elder Yan’s eyes. He saw how Sword Saint Rao shook her head rapidly. She stretched out her hand as if she wanted to say something.

He felt a chill that came from nowhere and it also rose from the soles of his feet to the top of his head.

“What is this thing…” When he turned his head, everything before him had turned black.

“Little thing, you’re quite powerful.”

Situ Yongren almost lost his ability to think when he heard the mocking voice.

However, the powerful knowledge base of the Divine Oracle helped him to determine that this was the voice of the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon.

The black color in front of him was its dragon scales!

“What beautiful dragon scales…”

Situ Yongren’s mind almost went blank, as if he was attracted by the most mysterious Path Principles runes on the dragon’s scales.

In the next second, his spirit, soul, and focus returned.

“Run!” Elder Yan’s voice rang out. He roared from below, his expression extremely distorted. “Brat, run!””

“Situ Yongren, get out of the way!” Rao Yaoyao also shook her head and cried out in shock.

“Rumble…”

The Ghost City of the Netherworld that had been split apart in the distance shattered and smashed down with a deafening boom.

Vaguely, they could still hear the disgusting, detestable, and crazy voices that drifted above their heads.

“Yes!”

“That’s it!”

“Reverend Dragon, go ahead and crush his sh*t with one claw. Don’t hesitate!”

“Kill him! I’ve tolerated this Divine Oracle for a long time already!”

Xu Xiaoshou’s voice…

Also, this was the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon!

Situ Yongren felt like he was about to explode. After his heartbeat resumed, it sped up crazily.

He finally remembered that he should use the Holy Power of the Divine Oracle to spy on the overall situation that he was not able to have a clear glimpse of at the moment.

After he saw this, his memories came back.

It turned out that when he attacked and split the Ghost City of the Netherworld with one sword strike, he still wanted to save Elder Yan and Sword Saint Rao.

Xu Xiaoshou, who had transformed into a winged black demon Berserk Giant, rode on the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon that reached out with its claws!

“No!”

Yu Lingdi was so frightened that he spat out a mouthful of blood and it was smeared all over his face. His expression became terrified.

Demonic Emperor Black Dragon!

This was the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon!

I’ll definitely die. I can’t escape at all!

“Situ Yongren, what are you doing?” Yu Lingdi’s furious roar sounded from afar.

This roar finally woke Situ Yongren up.

If he did not resist, he would never have another chance in this life.

“Die!”

The Demonic Emperor Black Dragon clenched its claws and he was already trapped within. Situ Yongren, who was unable to escape, felt a terrifying pressure on his body.

It was also because the outer shell of the Divine Oracle was too strong. Otherwise, he would have been crushed without even a moment of buffer time.

“Dao Rune Form!”

“Run!” With a loud roar, the Divine Oracle seized the opportunity and turned into a flood of ancient words. He slipped through the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon’s claws like a fish at lightning speed.

I came out!

I did it!

I survived!

Situ Yongren was ecstatic.

He realized that Elder Yan was right. The Demonic Emperor Black Dragon was just a consciousness incarnation with limited combat strength.

If he used all the methods he had, he could defeat it.

But at this moment, before he could react, the Divine Oracle took the initiative to send a picture to the controller:

The Demonic Emperor Black Dragon was not shocked at all when it was unable to crush the Divine Oracle who had turned into characters to escape.

It immediately changed its move and opened its mouth to gather endless Heaven and Earth energy. It even sucked the ancient characters transformed by the Divine Oracle into a ball into its mouth.

“Demon Emperor’s Roar!”
